Title: Comarch Animation Framework
Description: Code-based animation framework for Silverlight and WPF
HomeWiki:
Comarch Animation Framework

A framework designed for WFP and Silverlight to simplify animation building.
It contains several pre-defined effects groups:
  • Entrance effects
  • Exit effects
  • Emphasis effects
Moreover the animation system expands Storyboard class with several methods:
  • AddStoryboard
  • AppendStoryboard
  • AddStoryboardsForObjects
  • AppendStoryboardsForObjects

Sample

To view a live sample click here

Single element animation

new Storyboard()
.AddStoryboard(1000, (element,storyboardBuilder) => storyboardBuilder .EntranceEffects.FlyIn(element), border)
.Begin();
This animates border control with a FlyIn effect.

Elements collection animation

new Storyboard()
.AddStoryboardsForObjects(1000, 100, (element, storyboardBuilder) =>storyboardBuilder .EntranceEffects.FadeIn(element), stackPanel)
.Begin();
This animates all controls in stackPanel with a FadeIn effect.

Complex animation

new Storyboard()
.AddStoryboard(0,OffsetFadeIn,border)
.AppendStoryboard(20,OffsetFadeIn,border1)
.AppendStoryboardsForObjects(0,150,OffsetFadeIn,stackPanel)
.Begin();

private void OffsetFadeIn(FrameworkElement element, StoryboardBuilder sbb)
{
    element.Opacity = 0;
    sbb.EntranceEffects.OffsetFadeIn(element,700,FlyDirection.Right,150);
}
This animations consists of three steps:
  1. border fades in
  2. 20ms after completion of step 1 border1 fades in
  3. In the end all control in stackPanel fadesIn.
